availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Elizabeth Reed. Father of Reuben Reed, Susan Reed, John Reed, Nancy Reed, Mary Reed, Rhody Reed, Pierce Reed, Malinda Reed, and Samuel Reed. Laborer in Edmonson County in 1850. Farmer in Brownsville, Edmonson County, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 40B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Brownsville, p. 75.
